title: My Uncle Is a Firefighter
subtle:
Personal Narrative (nonfiction), 829 words, Level P (Grade 2), Lexile 610L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     J and M
description: Tillie is so excited to visit her uncle at work-he is a firefighter, and she gets to visit him at the fire station! Come along with Tillie as her Uncle Jason shows her around the fire station, and Tillie tries on his gear, learns about his equipment, and even sees what happens when an emergency call comes in. Students will enjoy the close-up view of how a firefighter works and lives. The book and lesson are also available at Levels J and M.
highFrequencyWords: emergency, equipment, firefighter, hydrant, rescued, shifts, stow, tinker, tour
reviewWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
comprehension: Vowel Digraphs : Identify vowel digraphs ea and ee
phonics: Suffixes : Identify and understand the use of suffix -ing
grammar:
Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
